We at SIS want all our members irrespective of age group, to feel young at heart and come and have a fun-filled evening. We all deserve that.

Come and dance like there's nobody watching. Dance, Dance, Dance till the stars come down from the rafters ...

Dance to the rhythm of tamil music with your loved friends and you will feel happiness like never before.

With a cultural treat at Ilamai Idho Idho, you are sure to welcome spring to your legs (pun intended…)

Turn Up and Soak Up ….. In the music and laughter
